column5: Apparently a piece of concrete fell off the bridge and into a car, and they have closed the highway so if you are heading up Barrie way, take another road!!  Joey
damn, glad i dont commute that way anymore. hope everyone's okay
dang.. did they say when it was to re-open?  heading through there tonight.
Highway 400 Link  I learned about is as a coworker has called from her car.  She left here at noon and has been sitting with her engine off and has not moved.  Joey
I picked a good day to work from home !

No one has been seriously hurt. They have all the lanes closed to make sure no more concrete is going to fall. They say it maybe a few hours til they open up the lanes again.  If your heading up,exit 88,head either east to Huronia rd,or head west to Vetran dr.
B101 has said the HWY is now open.  Yer good to go Raf
thanks for the info, I'm heading south through that area tonight
it was a nightmare with the extra 42 million cars running through Bradford
Terry, did you see anyone you know?  I should think so.
no  it was only 1 million people driving around in circles trying to get out of town seems they went in circles 42 times

I wouldn't even touch the 400NB tonight.  I got off at 9, made my way over to 5srd, then west on 13th, then up 8th line all the way to 25th, then back on to 27N..  Lots of snow coming down, whatever way you take be careful!
Yep the white stuf is falling again. Here we go again.  Terry,I seen you ,????????????? GET OFF THE CORNER.LOL
a man's gotta fish bill!   i wont be leaving till 10pm or so.. i hear you guys are getting squalls now, hopefully that passes.  it's not bad north of you.
Raf, you'll most likely be fine later on.  when I was coming home at 4, the snow really started to fly!  Be careful and good luck this weekend.
Star'y and windless here in Penetang Raf.
